results.title: Rippled
results.creator_credit: Darcy Prendergast, All India Radio and Oh Yeah Wow Pty Ltd
results.brief_description:
‘Rippled’ features a range of animation techniques - including light painting - to evoke a dystopian nighttime urban landscape of eerie beauty being explored by a creature of ambiguous identity.
Animators: Josh Thomas, Michael Greaney, Josh OKeefe, Donna Yeatman, Darcy Prendergast, Seamus Spilsbury, Andrew Onorato
Music: Martin Kennedy (All India Radio)

results.title: River watch
results.creator_credit: Sydney Newman, Roger Morin and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The story of how the St. Lawrence River is kept open for navigation is told, mentioning the parts played by lighthouses, marker buoys and ice breakers.

results.title: Rivals. Abseiling. Wave jumping
results.creator_credit: Tony Wheeler, Jason Morris, Tom McPartland, Kay Francis, Health Media and Education Centre and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Buzz”.
1. Rivals (5 min.) examines the competition, drive and energy involved in athletic sports for the disabled highlighting wheelchair racing. 2. Abseiling (5 min.) shows a group of adolescents from Fairfield Police Boys Club, Sydney being taught rock climbing. 3. Wave Jumping (5 min) examines the popular surf sports of windsurfing and sailboarding from both technical and recreational perspectives.

results.title: Rikki-tikki-tavi
results.creator_credit: Chuck Jones and Chuck Jones Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Kipling classic from ‘The jungle books’”.
An animated version of Rudyard Kipling’s tale of a mongoose who is saved from a storm by a boy and his parents, and then becomes the family’s defender against the dreaded cobras that roam the compound. Narrated by Orson Welles. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.

results.title: Rio Lobo (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Howard Hawks, Howard Hawks Productions and Malabar Productions
results.brief_description: John Wayne portrays a former Union officer searching for a traitor in this post-Civil War action drama directed by Howard Hawks. The war is over, but Col. Cord McNally (Wayne) is still hunting the informer who caused the death of a young officer. His quest brings him to the town of Rio Lobo, where he joins forces with two ex-rebels, helps save this small piece of Texas from ruthless outlaws, and finally comes face to face with his quarry. Featuring Jennifer O’Neil, Chris Mitcham and Jack Elam, this film brings together the talents of two Western legends.

results.title: River (Planet earth)
results.creator_credit: Peter Raymont, Planet Earth and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Takes a look at the Saskatchewan-Nelson river system in order to examine the impact which a water system has upon the economy, sociology and ecology of a nation.

results.title: The White seal
results.creator_credit: Chuck Jones and Chuck Jones Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Kipling classic from ‘The jungle books’”.
Based on a tale in Kipling’s “The Jungle Book”, this exciting animated film follows the exploits of Kotick, the white seal, as he struggles to survive and save his friends from seal hunters in the Bering Sea. Narrated by Roddy McDowall to music from Beethoven’s Sixth Symphony. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.
